workExperienceList.title: Front-end Developer
description: Developed and improved user interfaces in the main web application.
Implemented a multilingual translation system with React i18n.
Worked with Google Firebase and Functions to add functionalities.
Optimized web features using Google Cloud.

workExperienceList.title: Front-end Developer
description: Developed web pages and components with React.js.
Integrated backend services through RESTful API and GraphQL.
Managed application state using Redux and Context.
Implemented styles and components with MUI Core, Icons, and SASS.
